thread.title: Jennifer Garner steps out with her three kids in LA | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Jennifer Garner steps out with her three kids in LA | Daily Mail Online

author: Sarah Sotoodeh For Dailymail.Com
title: Jennifer Garner steps out with her three kids in LA | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share The former Alias star shielded her eyes with brown tinted sunglasses while rocking a makeup free face. Jennifer has three children with her ex, actor Ben Affleck; the twosome were married for 10 years before parting ways in June 2015. Beaming: The actress kept it casual in spandex bottoms with a matching shirt and a jacket Leading the way: The 44-year-old slipped on leggings with a puffy coat for her outing with her three kids: Violet, 11, Seraphina, eight, and Samuel, four The former lovebirds are on good terms though; they are often seen going to church or lunch together with their three children. For school, sister Violet and Seraphina wore matching light blue skirts with navy tops and bright sneakers. After dropping her daughters off, Jennifer and son Samuel enjoyed a mommy and me stroll. Happy: For school, sister Violet and Seraphina wore matching light blue skirts with navy tops and bright sneakers Looking good: Jennifer hit the pavement in teal and white sneakers with her brunette tresses pulled back into a ponytail Natural beauty: The former Alias star shielded her eyes with brown tinted sunglasses while rocking a makeup free face The adorable youngster wore dark joggers with a colorful shirt and a puffy jacket like his mother. While they are no longer together, Ben and Jennifer have yet to file for divorce. During a Times Talk last December, Ben, 44, called the birth of his kids the most defining moment of his life and named Jennifer as the 'world's greatest mom,' via People . Jennifer recently wrapped her upcoming film, The Tribes Of Palos Verdes, which will be released sometime this year. So sweet: Later dropping her daughters off, Jennifer and son Samuel enjoyed a mommy and me stroll Family always comes first: Ben Affleck seen taking his three kids to church in December 2016 in LA; Jennifer soon followed and joined them inside the church
